name: River Street Café
text:
River Street Café - Hot Menu (November 2025)
Thunder Bay 55 Plus Centre 700 River Street (807) 684-3260
November 3 Rotini Rosa & Garlic Bread $10.99
November 4 Meatloaf, Mashed Potatoes & Carrots $13.50
November 5 Sweet & Sour Chicken with Rice & Broccoli $13.50
November 6 Grilled Rueben & Soup Combo $8.50
November 7 Beef Taco Bowl $10.99
November 10 Hot Chicken Sandwich with Roasted Potatoes & Peas $13.50
November 11 Remembrance Day, Centre & Café Closed
November 12 Honey Garlic Meatballs, Peppers, Onions & Rice $13.50
November 13 Bacon Mushroom Swiss Burger & Garden Salad $13.50
November 14 Spinach & Feta Flatbread $10.99
November 17 Penne Bacon Carbonara & Garlic Bread $10.99
November 18 Hearty Chill & Dinner Roll $10.99
November 19 Ham, Scalloped Potatoes & Carrots $13.50
November 20 Pulled Pork On A Bun with Coleslaw & Baked Beans $10.99

November 25 Lasagna & Caesar Salad $13.50
November 26 Roasted Chicken & Caesar Salad $13.50
November 27 Pierogies, Bacon, Onions & Sour Cream $10.99
November 28 *Pre-order by November 21* Liver & Onions, Mashed Potatoes, Turnip & Carrot Medley $13.50
River Street Café Breakfasts
Finn Pancake Tuesdays Time: 8:30 to 10:00 am 2 Finn Pancakes & Choice of 2 Sausages OR 2 Slices of Bacon $10.99
Waffle Thursday – November 13 & 27 Time: 8:30 am to 10:00 am Strawberry Waffles with whipped cream and 2 slices of bacon $10.99
Denver Omelette – November 6 & 20 Time: 8:30 am – 10:00 am $10.99
Everyday Menu Items
Served 8:30 am to 10:00 am Toast with Jam $2.25 Oatmeal with Cinnamon Brown Sugar & Granola $4.00
Served 11:30 am to 1:00 pm Hot Dog $5.00 Cheeseburger $6.00 Wraps $7.50 (Mondays only) 2 Boiled Eggs, Cold $2.00 Salad $5.50 Soup & Sandwich $8.50 Sandwich $5.00 Soup $4.50
Please note Cheeseburgers and Hot Dogs will be made to order. Please allow 15 minutes for preparation
Menu Items Available Anytime (8:30 am to 2:30 pm) Coffee / Tea $1.75 Milk / Juice / Pop $2.00 Muffin / Biscuit / Cookie $2.00 Specialty Dessert (Date Square, Lemon Square, Butter Tarts) $2.75 Cinnamon Buns $4.00 (Wednesdays after 11 am, excluding 3rd Wed of the month)
All menu items subject to applicable taxes
About the Café The River Street Café is independently operated in the Thunder Bay 55 Plus Centre. The Café is a not-for-profit food service and is a City of Thunder Bay Volunteer Program for seniors. All income is used to pay wages, food, equipment, dishwashing, and Café supplies. In agreement with the City of Thunder Bay, the 55 Plus Food Program Board of Directors contributes a yearly amount towards the Centre’s operating budget to help offset the operation of the Thunder Bay 55 Plus Centre.
Café Hours of Operation Monday to Friday, 8:30 am - 2:30 pm Hot Lunch Served: Monday to Friday, 11:30 am – 1:00 pm (while quantities last) $10 Gift Certificates available at the Café Now Accepting Debit
